pli-tv-pvr1.11:5.1: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.11:5.2: Methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevanapaccayā āpattiyo catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr1.11:6.1: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ kati vipattiyo bhajati?
pli-tv-pvr1.11:6.2: Anādariyaṃ paṭicca udake uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā kheḷaṃ vā karaṇapaccayā āpatti catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ ekaṃ vipattiṃ bhajati—
